column1: '''Sindanórie''' is a said to be the name of a "mythical region of shadows", situated at the outer feet of the [[Pelóri]] Mountains in [[Valinor]].<ref name=PE17>{{PE

column3: Farewell}}</ref> [[Galadriel]] said that out of a Grey Country (''sindanóriello'') darkness lay on the waves that separated herself and [[Varda]].<ref>{{webcite
